home_text1: We have created an internet banking training platform (in a game format) which will reduce the hesitation of people to bank through internet. We help people understand basics of internet banking through our website in a fun way.
home1_text1: Today, in our society there are lot of people who hesitate to perform banking through internet or to access bank services.
home1_text2: There could be many reasons like – trust issues, security issues, transparency, lack of knowledge to use it, etc.
home1_text3: Out of these problems, lack of knowledge is a drawback which doesn’t even give opportunity to explore this domain of banking. It is also a problem which can be tackled easily.
mission_text: We want to provide the best experience for all our students to learn about internet banking in a fun way. This will help them to do banking tasks in a much easier and faster way in the real world.
vision_text: To make every possible citizen of our country literate about internet banking.
f2: User will get real-world banking experience
f3: User will own a virtual debit card
f6: Audio and video support to each web page
signup_text1: Sign up and explore the world of internet banking !
signin_text2: If you already has an account, just sign in. We've missed you!
name: Name

s2_text: Your friend should register himself/herself on our website to get the invite reward of 250 pts
